name: @n8n/n8n-nodes-langchain.toolVectorStore
description: Answer questions with a vector store

properties.displayName: This node must be connected to an AI agent. Insert one
properties.name: notice
name
properties.description: Name of the data in vector store. This will be used to fill this tool description: Useful for when you need to answer questions about [name]. Whenever you need information about [data description], you should ALWAYS use this. Input should be a fully formed question.

properties.name: description
properties.placeholder: [Describe your data here, e.g. a user's name, email, etc.]
properties.description: Describe the data in vector store. This will be used to fill this tool description: Useful for when you need to answer questions about [name]. Whenever you need information about [data description], you should ALWAYS use this. Input should be a fully formed question.

properties.name: topK
properties.description: The maximum number of results to return
